name: play-audio-url
description: Plays audio when it's possible to play it via an HTMLAudioElement (as of 3/1/2019, this will work in Firefox and Chrome) and falls back to downloading the audio file and playing via an AudioContext if it can't (as of 3/1/2019, Safari doesn't allow HTMLAudioElement to play programmatically, even if the user has already clicked on the web page).
author: Jim Kang
